entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-12-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Route parameter TryParse checks does not handle handler parameters with [FromRoute] attribute where name is provided. #45581
  • Multiple memory leaks when restarting WebApplication #45579
  • [AOT] Make BindConverter safe for AOT or mark as unsafe #45578
  • AddRazorRuntimeCompilation is hardcoded to use SHA1 for checksum comparison and PrecompiledView are provided with SHA256 checksum. #45577
  • Automate template updates into dotnet/installer #45576
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor Server PersistComponentState public Persist/TryTake from byte[] methods #45574
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #45571
  • Perf improvement: connectionclosehttps, fortunes, plaintext_nodejs #45570
  • Enable ALPN tests/features on MAC #45569
  • Adding Http(Request/Response) extension methods overloads accepting non-generic JsonTypeInfo #45568
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add CancellationToken to UserManager<>/SignInManager<> #45567
  • Blazor - Virtualization, mixing data between components on first load #45565
  • OutputCacheAttribute ignores excludeDefaultPolicy if a custom BasePolicy is defined #45564
  • Add ASPNETCORE_URLS_GRPC change #45563
  • Perf improvement: json, json_nodejs #45560

Closed

  • Targeting pack PlatformManifest.txt built by source-build has differences vs. official build #37651
  • ASP.Net Core 6 SignInManager PasswordSignInAsync throws provider null exception #44431
    Discussions
  • Stop Collecting CI Test Bin Logs #37343
  • Weird mix of Turkish and English when restoring #39978
  • Perf regression: updates #45561
  • Run `startvscode.sh` returns a syntax error #40250
    7.0-preview3
  • Update to latest stable version of Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers (3.3.3) to fix Roslyn crashing issue #41099
    7.0-preview6
  • JSON polymorphic serialization does not add $type to single controller results #45548
  • 404 with _content/Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements/BlazorCustomElements.js #45558
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #45534
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #45546
  • Issues hit with BuildFromSource.md doc #44346
    .NET 8 Planning
  • gRpc transcoding is not working- unable to find annotation.proto and http.proto are thrown #45287

PullRequests

Created

  • [AOT] Fix Web UI AOT Warnings #45580
    area-blazor
  • remove duplicate null check #45575
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Try running Diagnostics.FunctionalTests in Helix #45573
    area-runtime
  • Fix support for parameter names sourced from attributes #45572
    area-web-frameworks
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2066599 #45566
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] [TS Client] Fix CompletionMessage result when passing false or null #45559
    area-signalr

Merged

  • Correct XML Doc spelling mistake #45562
    area-security, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Add compatibility suppression files to repo #45507
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Get EmptyHttpResult in RDF via reflection #45354
    area-runtime, area-web-frameworks
  • [release/2.1] Turn on Component Governance #40885
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Reimplement the default object pool for improved performance #45251
    Perf, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • DefaultProblemDetailsWriter.CanWrite without Accept header #45158
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `93f08be` to `1f643f7` #45388
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `eb74422` to `f6fabbb` #45389
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Allow injection of Gson or JsonParser (or both) when constructing JsonHubProtocol #45555
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • Caching.StackExchangeRedis: add "force reconnect" pattern #45261
  • Support STJ Polymorphism #45405
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce non-virtual RegisterTokenProviderCore method. #45413
    area-identity
  • Update selenium dependency versions #44834
